article_title: This Is Obamacare 'Working The Way It Should?'

article_metadata.description: At a town hall meeting earlier this month, President Obama declared that his signature health reform law "is working the way it should." That's news to employers, who are facing higher health costs and staggering administrative burdens thanks to the law. They've responded in part by cutting hours and cancelling benefits [...]
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
